description.@value: Elegant and Easy! This Coffee with Chocolate and Honey recipe is a delightful choice for entertaining or to make a festive weeknight treat.

recipeInstructions.@value: HEAT milk, morsels, coffee granules and honey in medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes or until morsels are melted and mixture reaches a gentle boil. Remove from heat.POUR evenly into 5 mugs. Top with a dollop of whipped cream; serve immediately.
